oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Grave of John Sevier
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: A [sepia] photograph of the grave of John Sevier in Macon County, Alabama, just before it was opened for removal of the remains. A fence and trees surround the tombstone.; Handwritten description on mounting board below image.
Buried here in 1815. Remains were removed and reinterred at Knoxville in 1889.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Sevier, John, 1745-1815
Sepulchral monuments; Cemeteries; Trees
